item.title: Pothole and cracks in the road, 28th March
item.description:
The road is uneven with potholes varying in size as well as cracks in the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Hales Close, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 28th March
item.description:
28 day with 2 way stop and go carriageway pothole 900x600x40mm tarmac patch required stats required (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle path tyre popping surface debris all along route, 28th March
item.description:
All the way along the cycle path from Churchdown to Cheltenham. Various broken glass, mud, blocked drains. The bit opposite the briarfields hotel routinely floods deeply across the entire width of the cyclepath/pavement. Be great if you could routinely sweep and clean it before people decide itâ€™s safer and less expensive on inner tubes to use the road!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 28th March
item.description:
28 day with road closure needed please refresh give way markings appropriately 20 meters best out of hours (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Three deep pot holes between 46 + 47 Cromwell Rd Lynworth Cheltenham, 28th March
item.description:
Deep erosion at end of tarmac joing perfect 80yr old concrete Road. Pot hole repairs in tarmac road are repaired about 6 to twelve months every time, if they were repaired then had a 5cm thick bitchamin seal they would last 10years!!!!!!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Lynworth Place, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
